original_text: Inequality (22) indicates that the maximum-norm is the loosest among all p-norms. Fortunately, this loosest constraint would not seriously affect the accuracy since the value of ||y||∞ is comparable to that of the 2-norm and 1-norm. The maximum-norm provides us with the largest number of possible solutions under a given error limitation [24]. This would greatly enhance the possibility of finding a group of optimized coefficients when scanning a vast solution set. On the other hand, checking the maximum deviation sounds more reasonable than checking the distance between the accurate and approximated wave numbers since it is not working in the space domain. Therefore, we chose the maximum-norm as our criterion for designing the objective functions to extend the accurate wave number coverage as widely as possible.
original_translation: La desigualdad (22) indica que la norma máxima es la más laxa entre todas las p-normas. Afortunadamente, esta restricción más laxa no afectaría seriamente la precisión, ya que el valor de ||y||∞ es comparable al de la 2-norma y la 1-norma. La norma máxima nos proporciona el mayor número de posibles soluciones bajo una limitación de error dada [24]. Esto mejoraría en gran medida la posibilidad de encontrar un grupo de coeficientes optimizados al explorar un vasto conjunto de soluciones. Por otro lado, verificar la desviación máxima parece más razonable que verificar la distancia entre los números de onda precisos y aproximados, ya que no está trabajando en el dominio espacial. Por lo tanto, elegimos la norma máxima como nuestro criterio para diseñar las funciones objetivo y ampliar la cobertura de números de onda precisos lo más ampliamente posible.

On the other hand, checking the maximum deviation sounds more reasonable than checking the distance between the accurate and approximated wave numbers since it is not working in the space domain.
Therefore, we chose the maximum-norm as our criterion for designing the objective functions to extend the accurate wave number coverage as widely as possible.
